name: Pangu - a short story of life
name_original: Pangu - a short story of life
description:
Build molecules using physical models or drawing on paper; capture them in augmented-reality with your phone. Then, you can manipulate these molecules of water, ethanol or adenine, and cause the appearance of hydrogen bonds.

Dip into the primordial soup, reconstitute the RNA, go back to the origins of life!

Pangu is a serious game supported by the CRI in partnership with the theoretical biochemistry laboratory - CNRS. Thanks to the Gamelab for its support and to the students of the FDV license (Carbon and Nitrogen Promotions) for their comments.
